message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. Would you like to purchase it from me for $120?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $100?
I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I have to consider my own needs. Would you be willing to meet me at $110 for the product?
